title: 24 Reasons to Stay at 24 North, Part 2
seo_title: 24 Reasons to Stay at 24 North, Part 2
seo_description: best hotel to stay in Key West for weddings, events, group meetings
more_content:
Key West is a desirable vacation option for its beaches, sunsets, relaxed island feel and Old Town funk.

Not sure where to stay? Here’s part two of our 24 reasons why 24 North Hotel is the hotel you’re looking for. Part 1 highlighted our swimming pool and outside bar, both providing a relaxing, carefree stay. On-site dining options and a free trolley to downtown makes it easy to get around. Here’s four more reasons why 24 North Hotel is an attractive option for your stay in Key West. 

Sunset Green Event Lawn.

Our new event space just opened in December, commemorated by our Flip Flops & Fireworks celebration. The outdoor area will play host to concerts and available for weddings, family reunions or other special events, complete with all the bells and whistles. More information about the Sunset Green Lawn here. See Michael McDonald headline at the Sunset Green on Feb. 28. More info here.

Stay in New Town.

24 North is situated in New Town, just a quick shuttle ride from downtown. The best beach on the island is just a mile away. At Smathers Beach you can rent out water sports equipment, parasail or just soak up the sun. Check out Fort East Martello Museum right next door which houses pieces of history within a historic fort.  

Group Stays.

Whatever the occasion, 24 North Hotel is prepared to meet any group accommodation needs. If you’re organizing a corporate event, our high-speed Wi-Fi and on-site Starbucks will make the trip seamless. Traveling with family? Our frequent shuttles downtown and day trip information at the concierge will make sure everyone in the family is happy. More information on group stays and rates here.

On-site Activities.

There’s always something happening at 24 North Hotel. We offer free yoga classes, weekly poolside DJ sets and Trivia Nights at the Toasted Coconut, to name a few. Want to see what’s happening when you’re in town? Check out city-wide Key West events and hotel activities here.

--

Book a stay with us. Best rates and specials here.
short_description: Here’s part two of our 24 reasons why 24 North Hotel is the hotel getaway you’re looking for.
